freePlanCard.description: Get 1 GB of encrypted cloud storage for free

faq.question: Can Internxt access my files?
answer: No. Internxt, along with any other third party, cannot access your files, photos, or data.

Internxt services feature zero-knowledge encryption, meaning only you can access and decrypt your private data and information. Additionally, Internxt uses post-quantum cryptography, the most advanced technology available to protect your information from any threat.

faq.question: Does Internxt store my password?
answer: No. As such, Internxt cannot store your password.
Your Internxt password is unique to you and is used to encrypt and decrypt your Internxt data. But if you want to change your password, you can do so from our app.

faq.question: Can I enable two-factor authentication (2FA)?
answer: Yes. You can set up two-factor authentication for your account through the Internxt web app.
You can also use Authy or other 2FA tools to generate a personal 2FA code with Internxt.

faq.question: Can I pay with credit card, PayPal, or cryptocurrency?
answer: Internxt currently accepts debit and credit cards (Mastercard, VISA, American Express, etc.). You can also pay through PayPal, Crypto and Klarna.
Upon request, we also accept cryptocurrencies and SEPA Debit. If you have questions about payment methods, simply email us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com).

faq.question: What is Internxt's refund policy?
answer: Internxt offers a standard 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid subscriptions, which starts counting as soon as you subscribe.
And if you're ever unsatisfied with our service, contact us at [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com) and request a refund.

faq.question: How can I contact support?
answer: Can't find what you're looking for? You can contact our technical support team through live chat or by emailing [hello@internxt.com](mailto:hello@internxt.com).

title.normal: Thousands of users are leaving iCloud, Google Drive, and Dropbox for

cards.name: Eva Williams
cards.review: I switched to Internxt for their zero-knowledge technology, post-quantum encryption, and open source code. Now only I can access my files and information, and I have everything protected online.

cards.name: Cristian M.
cards.review: Internxt is a private and secure cloud storage service. It has a simplified interface, easy to use, and good customer service, making it an excellent choice.

cards.name: Josep Carrizo
cards.review: Internxt is a private and secure cloud storage service. It has a simplified interface, easy to use, and good customer service, making it an excellent choice.

ReviewSection.pcMag: "Internxt is on **mega-sale**, has **excellent user reviews**, **end-to-end** and **post-quantum encryption**, and they make their code completely **open source** for total transparency with their customers."
ReviewSection.mashable: "Get **serious** about **securing your important data** with Internxt. They make **privacy** their **top concern**, so you can rest easy knowing your files are **safe** and the platform values **transparency** for its users."
ReviewSection.pcWorld: "Internxt's **intuitively web access**, **file sync**, and **backup services** are **impressive**. This encrypted online storage and backup service is **easy**, covers all the bases, and the current **lifetime plans** are a **steal**."

OfficalCloudProvider.title: Valencia CF official cloud provider
OfficalCloudProvider.description: Valencia CF has reached an agreement with Internxt, where Internxt becomes the club's official cloud provider. Internxt is consolidating its position as a European leader in digital privacy with this new partnership. This agreement marks a milestone in Internxt's innovative approach that champions digital sovereignty and data protection.

AwardWinningSection.title: Award winning privacy
AwardWinningSection.description: With Internxt's internationally recognized zero-knowledge encryption, only you and the people you choose can access your files — not even us.
AwardWinningSection.subtitle: Your peace of mind, our guarantee.

NextGenSection.title: Next-gen encryption for ultimate protection
NextGenSection.description: We protect your file's security and privacy with advanced encryption to future-proof against emerging threats.

descriptions: We don't store passwords or user data and all of your data is encrypted in-transit and at-rest. Internxt puts you in full control of your files. Your data is your business. Protecting it is ours.
Internxt is the only cloud storage that automatically encrypts your files using end-to-end and post-quantum cryptography, meaning only you can access your data.
We are proud of what we do, so our code is made public on GitHub and can be personally reviewed, audited, and verified by anyone. We have nothing to hide but your data.
We're wholly GDPR compliant and 100% safe, but don't take our word for it. Internxt has been independently audited and verified by Europe's leading penetration testing company, Securitum.

TrustedBySection.title: Trusted by people like you
TrustedBySection.review: I keep my information secure online thanks to Internxt. Their customer support is fast, and their services are incredibly reliable. The fact that they are audited, open-source and encrypted makes me rest assured that my data is always protected from third-parties.
TrustedBySection.author: Sandra Díaz - Trustpilot Review
